build.buildCommand: composer install --optimize-autoloader --no-dev && npm install && npm run build && php artisan storage:link

deploy.startCommand: while ! mysqladmin ping -h$MYSQLHOST -P$MYSQLPORT -u$MYSQLUSER -p$MYSQLPASSWORD --silent; do echo 'Waiting for database connection...'; sleep 2; done && echo 'Database is ready, starting process.' && php artisan migrate:fresh --force --seed && php artisan cache:clear && php artisan config:clear && php artisan route:clear && php artisan view:clear && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=$PORT
